    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;
    color: #c00100;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;
    background-color: #061b30;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;

	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;

}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.pkg-exc ul li {

}

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Singapore Bali Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/bali-tour-packages" title="Bali Tour Packages">Bali</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Singapore Bali Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c319a4c5ca6_42023614" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/include/bali-singapore_zhlosw.jpg" alt="Singapore Bali Tour Package" title="Singapore Bali Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>For 7 days and 6 nights forget the fast paced life through Singapore with Bali tour package which will not only be rejuvenating but will also be an entirely new experience. You will be taken through the rich wilderness and exotic locations of Bali and some of the most breathtaking views in Singapore. Experience life through a new perspective and welcome yourself to the places where the water is as blue as the sky and your dreams run free.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Singapore Bali Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Bali</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Once you arrive at Bali you will immediately be transferred to your hotel where you are free to relax. During late in the evening you will be free to do all your leisure activities and explore the nearby places. This is the best opportunity for you to try out some local cuisines like, Lawar, Bebek Betutu, satay and much more which will be a treat for your taste buds.</p>
<p>You can also shop for souvenirs in the nearby local markets like, traditional handicrafts and paintings, jewellery pieces, home décor items, ecofriendly bags and a whole range of other items.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Bali Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>The first half of your day will be free for your leisure activities and the sightseeing of this beautiful lush city will commence in the evening you will be made to proceed towards Tanjung Benoa Beach, which is best if visited during the evening, when the entire peninsula comes to life.</p>
<p>Here you can choose from various fun activities like, snorkeling, sea walking, parasailing, rolling donuts and so much more. Cruise will be your next option where you will be served dinner. You will also witness the grand sun setting in the horizon before heading back to your hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Bali Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Just like the previous day, the first half of your day will be free for you to do some leisurely activities while the main activities will commence in the afternoon starting with a wonderful sunset experience, and then you will be driven to Uluwatu, which is located on the South western tip of Bali and is one of the top tourist destinations among vacationers.</p>
<p>A prime surfing destination, this place is also home to numerous holy temples including Pura Uluwatu, which is located on a cliff top which gives its visitors a panoramic view of the shimmering, unending blue ocean.</p>
<p>You will also be made to enjoy the local Kecak dance form of the Balinese performance along with a delicious dinner.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Bali – Singapore</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Early in the morning, you will be driven to the airport from where your journey towards Singapore will commence. Once you arrive at Singapore you will be taken to your allotted hotel where the evening will be free for you to leisure around and explore the nearby places of interest.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Singapore Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Your city sightseeing tour of Singapore will start off after breakfast and will begin with a visit to the Universal studio which is home to 24 different rides, various shows and numerous exciting attractions. These seven different themed zones make it an exciting holiday destination for families.</p>
<p>Next you will be escorted to one of the prime locations in Singapore which is Jurong Bird Park, located on the highest point in Jurong region and is home to 5,000 animals belonging to 380 different species.</p>
<p>Your evening will end at a rejuvenating note, by witnessing the glorious sunset at Sentosa. Here you will be taken on a mono cable car ride; you will also watch the dolphin lagoon where the dolphins will showcase their skills.</p>
<p>After a fun and thrilling day you will be taken back to your hotel concluding your trip there.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Singapore City Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>The entire day today is free for you to explore the magnificent city of Singapore. You can start by visiting one of the most popular tourist attractions, Gardens by the bay, which is a manmade towering garden which is engulfed in colorful and green vines climbing up till the top of the tower. This is a wonderful effort made by the Singapore government to improve the quality of air and let the citizen breath air free of pollutants. Your next stop can be Merlion Park, the Singaporean landmark of half fish and half lion spouting water.</p>
<p>Later on you can head towards a giant observation wheel known as Singapore flyer, which is in the form of a ferris wheel. One can view the entire city of Singapore from top of the wheel and have a panoramic view of the city. The 541 feet high wheel is a great way of getting the bird’s eye view.</p>
<p>Finally you will head on to do some shopping of souvenirs in the colorful and vibrant marketplaces before reaching your hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Singapore Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Your day will commence with a hearty breakfast meal before being escorted to the airport from where you will catch your flight onwards.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Singapore Bali Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Should You Go To Singapore And Bali?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The weather in Singapore and Bali is similar. The best time to visit both countries for dry weather is from April to September. Bali's rainy season lasts from October to March.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Should I Keep In Mind When Visiting Bali?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> </p>
<ul>
<li>You must remove your shoes before entering the temples.</li>
<li>Avoid consuming tap water.</li>
<li>Wearing revealing clothing to temples is not permitted.</li>
<li>Avoid using your left hand to give or accept items.</li>
<li>Drug possession and consumption can result in prison.</li>
<li>Maintain Proper Etiquette During Ids / Ips.</li>
<li>It is prohibited to honk without reason.</li>
</ul></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Makes Singapore Famous?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Singapore is well-known for being a global financial centre, being one of the most densely populated cities in the world, having a world-class city airport with a waterfall, and having a World Heritage Site Botanic Garden.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Can You Expect From The Food In Bali?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Rice is the mainstay of Balinese cuisine, and it is served with almost every meal. This is usually served with vegetables, meat, or seafood that has been seasoned with a variety of spices and sauces. Keep an eye out for the deliciously spicy sambal, a fiery red condiment served alongside many traditional dishes.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Are The Most Popular Foods In Singapore?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> </p>
<ul>
<li>Chicken rice in Hainanese style.</li>
<li>Crab with Chilli.</li>
<li>Laksa.</li>
<li>Char Kway Teow (fried rice).</li>
<li>Mee Hokkien prawn.</li>
<li>Stingray that has been barbecued.</li>
<li>Curry with fish head.</li>
</ul></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>

excerpt.rendered: Singapore Bali Tour Package Home » International » Bali » Singapore Bali Tour Package Tour Overview For 7 days and 6 nights forget the fast paced life through Singapore with Bali tour package which will not only be rejuvenating but will also be an entirely new experience. You will be taken through the rich wilderness...
